statements: UPDATE customer_surveys SET feedback = 'Great service! Thank you' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_surveys SET satisfaction_score = 4, customer_name = 'Alice' WHERE survey_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_surveys SET satisfaction_score = 5, feedback = 'Great service' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE customer_surveys SET feedback = 'Average experience', satisfaction_score = 3 WHERE customer_name = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE surveys SET satisfaction_score = 8 WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET total_purchases = 20, loyalty_level = 2 WHERE customer_id = 5;
UPDATE surveys SET satisfaction_score = 5 WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET loyalty_level = 2, total_purchases = total_purchases + 1 WHERE customer_id = 100;
UPDATE customer_survey SET satisfaction_score = 4 WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE survey_responses SET response_value = 'Agree' WHERE survey_id = 1 AND question_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_survey SET satisfaction_score = 5 WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE survey_responses SET response_value = 'Agree' WHERE survey_id = 1 AND question_id = 3;
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name = 'Alice', customer_email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Survey SET survey_rating = 5, customer_id = 2, survey_date = '2023-12-05' WHERE survey_id = 3;
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Survey SET survey_date = '2022-05-10', survey_rating = 5 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_phone='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Response SET response_text='Good', customer_id=1 WHERE response_id=1;

UPDATE Question SET question_text = 'How satisfied are you with our service?' WHERE question_id = 201;
